values:
Semi-Friends Only
LEAVE A COMMENT TO BE ADDED
Friending Policy
♥ This journal is not entirely focus on sharing ♥ Have the same and/or common interest ♥ Must be open-minded during discussions ♥ Have a sense of humour; life is too serious
♥ Seiyuu blabbering & releases ♥ Fandom blabbering & releases

Saiyuki Burial Vol. 3: The Camellia Flower I will encode the Ishida Akira and Hirata Hiroaki Commentary tomorrow. Shirochan is probably drooling over the other half for it (laughs). Please comment when take something... If someone is interested in making a torrent and seed it; go right ahead. I lack the patience for it. Download 1: [AVI, 258 MB] Saiyuki Burial Vol. 3 - Hakkai & Gojyo Saga Download 2: [MP3, 320] Hirata Hiroaki - After** Download 3: [AVI, 497 MB] Saiyuki Burial Vol. 3 - Ishida Akira & Hirata Hiroaki Commentary Codec Problem: http://www.sendspace.com/file/b34b7o http://www.megaupload.com/?d=6ZI02YQE Uploaded and Fixed by ** After is composed and written by GARDEN If you have trouble with watching any videos download: Combined Community Codec Pack Video Lan VLC Media Player

Cleaning Harddrive: Massive Saiyuki Dump I am cleaning my harddrive due lack of space and I will only upload these once in order to feed your fandom needs, but there is a possibility of digging out my burned DVD to share them again. A thanks of appreciation or comment will be nice; after all I am feeding your fandom needs.

Shimokawa Mikuni - Alone C/W Track 2 Kimi no Itaikai Gensomanden Saiyuki Image Albums Vol. 1 - 3 Gensomanden Saiyuki Image Albums Vol. 1 Gensomanden Saiyuki Image Albums Vol. 2 Gensomanden Saiyuki Image Albums Vol. 3 Saiyuki Reload-Gunlock OP-ED Full Singles Wag - Don't Look Back Again Doa - Shiro no Jumon Buzzlip - Wild Rock Flow-war - Mitsumeteitai Wag - Fukisusabu Kaze no Naka de Flow-war - ID Saiyuki Individual Character Vocal Collection Sanzo Song Collection (Seki Toshohiko) Saiyuki Burial Burial Vol. 1 OST (With Tracklist) GARDEN - Late-Show OP Hirata, Hoshi, SekiToshi - Shiny Moon ED Zero-Sum Burial Drama CD Saiyuki Reload Burial Drama CD [No Booklet] G-Fantasy Collection CD Drama G-Fantasy Collection Vol. 2 - Kyo Ka Sui Getsu G-Fantasy Collection Vol. 3 - Rasen no Koyomi Gaiden Drama CD Gaiden Drama Vol. 1 Gaiden Drama Vol. 2 Reload Vocal Reload Vocal Album Vol. 1 Reload Vocal Album Vol. 2 Gunlock Vocal Gunlock Vocal Album Vol. 1 Gunlock Vocal Album Vol. 2 Saiyuki Reload Graffiti Booklet Saiyuki Reload Graffiti Uploaded & Scanned by Tokito Miscellaneous Saiyuki Reload Voice CD Uploaded by Ditch Gospel Saiyuki Reload Lively & Relax Day Instrumental Kusao Takeshi (Kougaiji) - Still Time Cover (Extracted from Hyakka Seiran -Dansei Seiyuu Hen- II)

Kurumada-sensei hold the brakes! Another Saint Seiya anime being animated, Saint Seiya: Omega. Lost Canvas isn't finished yet, and there was also a 3D CGI animated movie that was being release as well. Is it end of February yet? Looking forward to Tsuboi Tomohiro's BL after Kawada Shinji released his end of December.
Rebirth of March Just something one should read about before going all crazy, Internet drowns in inaccurate anti-ACTA arguments. The universe will work itself out.... Path of righteousness?

Times Change, Move Over Migrating my Livejournal to Dreamwidth. If you want to add me: http://kenyuu.dreamwidth.org/. Not sure to do with the communities anymore since it's pretty much beyond dead to revive. One of these days will get back to writing... My life is still very much on Twitter: @hypnospuppy. All I do is talk about a certain anime and seiyuu... Following them pretty much changes said inner-world.

No Subject Lines What gives Livejournal? I can't even comment on the comment page with the new setting you just made a even bigger mess of. And we no longer have subjects title for commenting, how are people suppose to response one another? ETA: Turns out to be the Grease Monkey. But New Comment gives a giant migraine.

Dream Phone Finally got my early Christmas Present, and tons of places with good deals this time of year. Paid with my own money but I still need a job. Samsung Galaxy SII X, slightly more advanced than the Galaxy SII... Finally caught up with the rest of the world with mobile phones |||Orz... Anyone needs me... Will be on Twitter as usual...

Kuroi Tsubasa (Black Wings)
I've been wondered in the dark deep in depth for quite long time If I could be the part of it maybe I can feel alright? Kokoro no oku Kioku no haioku Tadazumu ano hi no shounen wa Ima mo iru Kurai Toki no naka samayou Shukumei ni aragau Ikari to itami wo Mikata ni shite Motto tsuyoku habatake Chi mo namida mo nuritsubuse Kuroi tsubasa surrounded by the pain that stings my heart the ache is all so real Just like the crow who lost his half the wing is gone in lonely view Kizuato ni wa Shinka no kasabuta Jibun wo tsukuu no wa Jibun igai ni wa inai Nidomo to Modorenai kinou wa Tsuri garasu no muku Rikaku wo shitsukushite mo Kesenakute Furimuku tabi kizuku Konraita michi wa mou nai Yami no kanata Shinya Okujou de miorosu Yurameku machi okari Dokomade tobetara Mitsukarun darou Owaranai tabi "Shinumade" Kurai Toki no naka samayou Shukumei ni aragau Ikari to itami wo Mikata ni shite Motto tsuyoku habatake Chi mo namida mo nuritsubuse Kuroi tsubasa I've been wondered in the dark deep in depth for quite long time If I could be the part of it maybe I can feel alright? Inner heart Memories of a deserted house But the boy stands there for days Still here Dark Amidst of time roam Fight against fate Just because Friends get mad and distress I want more strength to fly To paint out blood and tears Black wings surrounded by the pain that stings my heart the ache is all so real Just like the crow who lost his half the wing is gone in lonely view These scars Evolution of scabs I want to save myself To except my lesser self Never again Can return to yesterday To face frosted glass Erase and Lose my silhouette Turn around to notice The present path is not there Beyond darkness Late at night Rooftop looking down An open town quivers Fly how far To discover An endless journey "Until death" Dark Amidst of time roam Fight against fate Just because Friends get mad and distress I want more strength to fly To paint out blood and tears Black wings

Tiger & Bunny Officially finished... Waiting for the next season, whatever the Creators of Sunrise and their Gundams have in store. Really digging Yuri x Burnaby though, but there's not enough Yuri to go around since it's pretty much Yuri's World of Justice (if anyone have watched any older works of Yusa Kouji can see it in this series as well)
Hakuouki Shinsegumi Tsushin Succho Ban Event My DVD has arrived... The box is very pretty too.
A Day Behind Home in Canada. Body needs rest.... Been feeling sick on the plane.
Pack Pack Pack Heading home from Asia soon.... Packing tomorrow.

Back from China Once again I'm back now... Went to Wuxi, Suzhou, Hangzhou, Nanjing (Nanking) and Shanghai. Lovely fall weather upon arrival and it's almost Mid-Autumn Festival held on September 12 (a day after 9/11) of this year, which a lot of moon cakes are being sold everywhere. And yes, the Chinese Lunar Calendar is scaringly accurate...
Lost Canvas Character Song Hell Yeah!!!! This man never fail to deliver and impress me at the same time. Forever the Grim Reaper since Viper's Creed!
Pictures from Osaka I haven't bother to upload them on Photobucket. You can check out the other pictures on my TwitPic/Twitter Account: http://twitpic.com/photos/hypnospuppy. Enjoy!
Saint Seiya: Lost Canvas Character Song Album Promo Drrr.....
Back from Japan Back home in Hong Kong yesterday evening.

Hello from Kyoto In Kyoto right now... There's internet! Enjoyed two days of Onsen already... It feels so good. Quite a lot of pampering and getting well fed! A lot of things here are quite expensive here, due the fact the yen is very high at the moment the exchange rate is 9.8% - 10%. The food that I have experienced before in my first trip to Tokyo, it's very reasonable, unless you are eating expensive food like Wagyuu Beef, Sea Urchin, King Crab ...etc.

Off to Japan Five days in Osaka, Japan (This will be my second trip, since last time was in Tokyo in 2005). Flying tomorrow morning, so packing tonight and.... Laptop is coming along. Will be posting in real time as usual. Pictures... Lots of pictures...

Back to Hong Kong Leaving aunt's house from Singapore. Need to start packing again.... Constant lack of sleep from endless travelling around Asia. Not to say being home sick from being home away from home, but who doesn't miss their own bed...
Back from Malaysia Back... In Singapore. Will be flying back to Hong Kong soon... Then to Osaka, Japan.
To Malayasia Heading over to Malaysia this Tuesday. Be back on Thursday night. Going to Kuala Lumpur and Malacca! Practically never online, life has forbidden me to read and watch Bleach.

Leaving for Singapore Packing right now... Have to leave for the airport at 4:30 or so. I have not travelled this much in my life since I came back in 2008. Finally some exercise I can do at my aunt's place! Bought a cheap but very decent bathing suit and swimming goggles! Sorry haven't been replying and such. Time is very valuable here!
Back from China. Off to Singapore Back from Dongguan, China. I had the best meal of my life. ^0^ We had Japanese Wagyuu Beef Hot Pot.

Trip to Osaka: Japan's History Booked a trip to Osaka in first week of August for five days. Heading over to Dongguang, China today.... I'm not sure where else we're going while been staying in Asia. Been more interested in sight-seeing and eating, since I have already bought too much at home and as well as here in Hong Kong. It's only a 4 hour flight from here to Japan anyway, so it's no big deal.
China Week Chiu Chow, Shenzhen, Guangzhou and this Saturday is Dongguan. There's not much to see, except sight-seeing certain places and shopping @D@

Shopping Paradise
Finally got Saiyuki Reload Vol. 10. Missing Vol. 9 now.... I might bought an extra copy of Vol. 8 which I need to check when I get home-home.
Chiu Chow, China: Buddhist Temples There's really not much to see in this region, short three day visit. Will share this much for now ^^;;

Back from Chiu Chow Will upload some Buddhist Temples and some Godly Deities tomorrow. It basically all around Buddhist Temple visit than anything else within the three days. There was relatively not much to see in that region compare to my last visit to Beijing with the Forbidden Palace and New Summer Palace (the Old Summer Palace one was Destroyed by French and English: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Old_Summer_Palace) Will likely be making another trip to another region in China. I forgot where now.... Need to ask female parental where we are going with friends, possibly taking us there.

Too Hot and Too Wet Summer Season Caught bad flu.... But getting better though. I haven't bother to post much as also fending off this flu at the moment, since after coming home from Macau few days ago. Flying over to Singapore soon for two weeks and also heading over to Malaysia this time around across the border from Singapore. And.... Studio Recording pic! ETA: I can't download anytihng from Megaupload. It's blocked in Hong Kong (The company is in Hong Kong. Shocking I know).

Don't Want It, Even If You Pay Me Went to local anime-game hangout a few days ago. Back at the same place where I bought Thanatos... They had Hakuouki Saitou Hajime for $150 HKD, but I don't like the figurine style. The same store had Saiyuki Gaiden for $40 HKD (about $5 CAD), I didn't buy it since I already made my detest about it. They did have tons of Saint Seiya figurines and loads of re-issue of Saint Seiya: Hades Chapter Elysion Thanatos figurine/soul -- I'm so tempted to buy another one XD!!!

Heaven on Earth
A family friend bought this for me today, since we're having lunch in the same area with some walking distance... It cost around $556 HKD ($70 CAD), the lady at the store gave me the character card for free *3*
In Hong Kong I have internet... It's somewhat slow. 15 hours direct butt-flight. I have made it here in one piece.... It's afternoon here right now. You folks sleeping over there?

At airport now Free Wifi.... I can't get into my Twitter or BA, somewhat slow internet. Checking in went smoothly, and screening since everyone still gets treated like a criminal between bordercrossings. Waiting for flight at Gate right now. ETA: Laptop battery has a half a life left... So see you soon <3

Canada Airlines on Strike Everything packed for Asia... Most of everything. Thank goodness is a direct flight... Have to sleep now, I have to be up in 4-5 hours from now. See you folks on the otherwisde.

World is Against Me Ground doesn't want me Neither does the sky Canada Post is on strike... So much for my delivered packages, I can say it's probably not as bad as current one when the Canada Airlines is walking out 12:01 AM tonight, if they can't reach an agreement: Air Canada strike talks near deadline... Going postal.... Frankly there's no way for me to take off tomorrow....

R.I.P. Kawakami Tomoko In case you haven't heard or Still living under a rock... Tomoko Kawakami passed away due fighing an illness since 2008 for ovarian cancer. Her notable roles were Chiriko (Fushigi Yuugi), Soi Fong (Bleach), Lirin (Saiyuki Reload/Gunlock), and many more. Confirmation Production Baobob and Anime News: Tomoko Kawakami Passes Away
